archimate:Requirement.name: TM.2.2.2a: a) actions to be taken by users in case of an information security event (e.g. noting all pertinent details immediately such as malfunction occurring and messages on screen; immediately reporting to the point of contact; and only taking coordinated actions)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
